    • Constructor Detail

      • CcddDbManagerDialog

        CcddDbManagerDialog(CcddMain ccddMain,
                    CcddConstants.DbManagerDialogType dialogType)
        Project database manager dialog class constructor
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class
        dialogType - database dialog type: LOGIN, SERVER, CREATE, OPEN, DELETE, or UNLOCK

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Create the project database manager dialog. This is executed in a separate thread since it can take a noticeable amount time to complete, and by using a separate thread the GUI is allowed to continue to update. The GUI menu commands, however, are disabled until the telemetry scheduler initialization completes execution

      • displayDatabaseError

        private void displayDatabaseError(java.lang.String action)
        Display the project database selection error dialog
        Parameters:
        action - database operation

      • addDatabaseInputFields

        private void addDatabaseInputFields(java.lang.String nameText,
                                    javax.swing.JPanel dialogPnl,
                                    boolean enabled,
                                    java.awt.GridBagConstraints dialogGbc)
        Add database name and description labels and fields to the dialog
        Parameters:
        nameText - text to display beside the name input field
        dialogPnl - panel to which to add the labels and fields
        enabled - true if the fields are initially enabled, false if disabled
        dialogGbc - dialog panel GridBagLayout layout constraints

        Verify that the dialog content is valid

      • doAccessUpdatesComplete

        protected void doAccessUpdatesComplete(boolean commandError)
        Perform the steps needed following execution of user access level updates to the database
        Parameters:
        commandError - false if the database commands successfully completed; true if an error occurred and the changes were not made

        private java.lang.String[][] getRoleInformation()
        Get the array of roles registered on the server
        Returns:
        Two-dimensional array where the first dimension contains the available roles and the second dimension is null

      • getDatabaseInformation

        private void getDatabaseInformation(boolean isOnlyUnlocked,
                                    boolean isOnlyLocked,
                                    java.lang.String enabledItem)
        Get the project database names and descriptions
        Parameters:
        isOnlyUnlocked - true if only unlocked databases are to be displayed
        isOnlyLocked - true if only locked databases are to be displayed
        enabledItem - name of an item to be enabled; null if none
